titleStmt.title: This being your Majesty's birth-day, I thought no time more proper than this, to return you thanks for your Majesty's speech, and more especially for declaring, that the Church of England is one of the greatest supports of the Protestant religion.
titleStmt.author: James, Elinor. ca. 1645-1719.

notesStmt.note: Title from first three lines of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
